newsitem.title: USA: A.H. Belo buys Gleaner publishing company.
newsitem.headline: A.H. Belo buys Gleaner publishing company.

text.p: A.H. Belo Corp said it had acquired the Gleaner and Journal Publishing Co of Henderson, Kentucky, which owns daily and weekly newspapers as well as a radio station and printing operations.
In a statement released Monday, the television broadcasting and newspaper publishing company said it had reached an agreement to buy the company's assets on February 25.
Terms were not disclosed and company officials were not available for comment.
On February 28, A.H. Belo completed the merger of The Providence Journal Co.
